name: Lesser Flamingo
description: The Lesser Flamingo is a small, vibrant bird known for its pink plumage and filter-feeding.
spread_note: Found in East Africa and parts of India and Pakistan.
food_note: Filter-feeds in alkaline lakes, often in large flocks.
proportions: Height: 80-90 cm, wingspan: 90-105 cm, weight: 1.5-2 kg.
reproduction: Lays 1 egg on a mud mound, incubation about 28 days.
attractions: Popular in zoos for their vivid colors and social behavior.
projects_note: Vulnerable due to habitat loss; conservation programs focus on lake preservation.
